content: उज्जृंभ् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To gape, open. {@--2@} To part asunder. {@--3@} To become visible, come or break forth, expand, rise, go up; वक्त्रेंदौ तव सत्ययं यदपरः शीतांशुरुज्जृंभते <ls>Ratn. 3. 13</ls>; <ls>K. 290</ls> {@--4@} To revive, come to senses; <ls>Mv. 6. 52.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To display, show. {@--2@} To produce; <ls>U. 5. 6.</ls>
